lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Justin Blau/Carly Paige/Marc Schneider/Savannah Giersch/Joe Mason/Richard Walters
[00:00.033] 作曲 : Justin Blau/Carly Paige/Marc Schneider/Savannah Giersch/Joe Mason/Richard Walters
[00:00.67]
[00:08.47]No talk, seven days
[00:10.68]Dead air, empty space
[00:13.61]Is this where we are now?
[00:17.28]Would call, but I don't
[00:19.42]You could, but you won't
[00:22.40]Cause it's been too long now
[00:24.91]
[00:26.22]I know that it happens
[00:28.51]People they grow apart but
[00:30.51]I never imagined
[00:32.18]It'd happen to us
[00:34.21]Cause I knew you so well
[00:36.88]Better than myself
[00:39.75]But everything's changed now
[00:42.22]
[00:42.23]Do you feel it?
[00:44.51]Drifting slowly down
[00:46.89]Do you feel it?
[00:49.16]Do you feel it?
[00:51.06]All this distance
[00:53.19]I've been reaching out
[00:55.66]Do you feel it?
[00:57.80]Do you feel the way we're falling outta touch?
[01:01.54]
[01:13.44]Do you feel it?
[01:15.27]Do you feel the way we're falling outta touch?
[01:30.55]Do you feel it?
[01:32.70]Do you feel the way we're falling outta touch?
[01:36.48]
[01:44.52]Long days, busy lives
[01:46.67]Just can't find the time
[01:49.64]Keep making excuses
[01:53.17]Would call, but I don't
[01:55.36]You could, but you won't
[01:58.34]We've gotten use to it
[02:00.90]
[02:02.23]I know that it happens
[02:04.49]People they grow apart but
[02:06.55]I never imagined
[02:08.21]It'd happen to us
[02:10.17]Cause I knew you so well
[02:12.83]Better than myself
[02:15.54]Better than myself
[02:17.57]
[02:18.30]Do you feel it?
[02:20.46]Drifting slowly down
[02:22.88]Do you feel it?
[02:25.11]Do you feel it?
[02:27.00]All this distance
[02:29.22]I've been reaching out
[02:31.57]Do you feel it?
[02:33.74]Do you feel the way we're falling outta touch?
[02:37.49]
[02:49.09]Do you feel it?
[02:51.34]Do you feel the way we're falling outta touch?
[03:06.52]Do you feel it?
[03:08.68]Do you feel the way we're falling outta touch?
[03:12.21]
tlyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:08.47]一言不发，整整七天
[00:10.68]死气沉沉，空空荡荡
[00:13.61]这就是我们的状态吗？
[00:17.28]本来可以打电话，但是我不愿意
[00:19.42]你也可以，但是你却没有那样做
[00:22.40]因为现在已经太长时间了
[00:24.91]
[00:26.22]我知道有一些事情的确会发生
[00:28.51]人与人之间会逐渐产生隔阂
[00:30.51]但我从来没有想过
[00:32.18]这会发生在我们身上
[00:34.21]因为我很了解你
[00:36.88]胜过了解我自己
[00:39.75]但一切都有变了
[00:42.22]
[00:42.23]你感觉到了吗
[00:44.51]慢慢向下坠落
[00:46.89]你感觉到了吗
[00:49.16]你感觉到了吗
[00:51.06]这遥远的距离
[00:53.19]我伸手想要触碰
[00:55.66]你感觉到了吗
[00:57.80]你感觉到了我们逐渐失去联系了吗
[01:01.54]
[01:13.44]你感觉到了吗
[01:15.27]你感觉到了我们逐渐失去联系了吗
[01:30.55]你感觉到了吗
[01:32.70]你感觉到了我们逐渐失去联系了吗
[01:36.48]
[01:44.52]漫长的日子，忙碌的生活
[01:46.67]找不到空余的时间
[01:49.64]不断寻找借口
[01:53.17]本来可以打电话，但是我不愿意
[01:55.36]你也可以，但是你却没有那样做
[01:58.34]我们已经习惯了这样
[02:00.90]
[02:02.23]我知道有一些事情的确会发生
[02:04.49]人与人之间会逐渐产生隔阂
[02:06.55]但我从来没有想过
[02:08.21]这会发生在我们身上
[02:10.17]因为我很了解你
[02:12.83]胜过了解我自己
[02:15.54]胜过了解我自己
[02:17.57]
[02:18.30]你感觉到了吗
[02:20.46]慢慢向下坠落
[02:22.88]你感觉到了吗
[02:25.11]你感觉到了吗
[02:27.00]这遥远的距离
[02:29.22]我伸手想要触碰
[02:31.57]你感觉到了吗
[02:33.74]你感觉到了我们逐渐失去联系了吗
[02:37.49]
[02:49.09]你感觉到了吗
[02:51.34]你感觉到了我们逐渐失去联系了吗
[03:06.52]你感觉到了吗
[03:08.68]你感觉到了我们逐渐失去联系了吗
[03:12.21]
